data.title: A quiet Friday afternoon
data.text: My first time , and it was quiet and I grab a bar stool , the Friendly Bartender was super nice , I had a Corona and Chicken Sandwich that was excellent ....watched some sports commentary on the HD screen, I'll have to return later on in the Evening sometime !!! or on a Sunday Game day !!!

data.title: Accommodating Sports Bar
data.text:
Was referred here by one of the hotel residents where I was staying, as he stated, the ppl are friendly, they take care of their customers, and it's clean. First, I appreciated the volume being turned up when the game started and actually got some of the other patrons wrapped up in the game with me, YeaH!! I had some special dietary considerations I asked to be accommodated when I went to request an order of food. The young lady stated she would try, but because the cook only spoke Spanish, she wasn't certain how close my accommodation would come. I mention to her I'm fluent in Spanish and if he's comfy coming out, I can help with my request. She comes back and says, I think we're good, he seems to know what it is you'd like. I'm so appreciative, because, yes, it was PERFECT!! 
The serving size was so much, too, that I was able to take home 1/2 for the next days' breakfast, perfect when staying in a hotel, and the price for what I'd ordered was spot on.
The Rangers beat the Astros, another YeaH!! and to celebrate, I ask the bartender what she would recommend for a specialty shot based upon things I like and don't like, and I don't recall what it was called, but she nailed it, getting just the right mix of not too sweet, fun, not knocking me off my feet, and yet potent.
Now I see why this place was recommended and even went back  the next night.

data.title: Sportzone
data.text: Friendly bartenders.  However, for a "sports bar," it is a little limited.  They do not have the NFL ticket nor the SEC network; therefore, all that is available is what is on the regular networks.  On the whole, I like the place.  Pretty good selection of beers.

data.title: Hit the Spot!!!
data.text: Had a delicious meal and cold drinks.. Great environment, music and friendly staff!  A couple of game tables to keep ya busy and TV's to watch your fav sports team!
